chunk_text:
Located in Sunriver, Oregon the Pacific Northwest's premier recreational and vacation destination since 1968, located about fifteen miles south of Bend in Central Oregon on the eastern side of the Deschutes River at the base of the Cascade Range, offering up to 300 days of sunshine each year! â€‹
Located on a quiet street on the edge of Sunriver Resort enjoy hikes, fly fishing, skiing and bike riding through the vast Sunriver trails or venture out into the neighboring public lands.
